cab.content:
Col. Dally Jones (This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T.5390
SECRET:-
CO-ORDINATION OF W0RK CONNECTED WITH PRISONERS OF WAR.
Admiralty Memorandum for the War Cabinet.
With reference to War Cabinet 451(12) and the Memorandum by the Secretary of State for War of 5th August, 1918 (G.T. 5332), the Admiralty concur in the proposal to set up a standing Inter-departmental Committee to consider all Prisoners of War questions, on the assumption that the arrangements contemplated would not debar the Admiralty from reference to the War Cabinet in the event of their dissenting from the decision in any matter of importance.
(Sgd) R.E. WEMYSS.
13. 8. 18.
